docs.title: Datasets from Wikipedia
docs.text: Many additional datasets that may be of interest to researchers, users and developers can be found in this collection. These data sets are not officially supported and may not be up to date.

docs.title: FTS advanced
docs.text: Adding data to a Full-Text index is referred to as population. In interest contrast to normal indexes, these populations are not part of a transaction. This means that even though the data has been inserted in a Full-Text indexed table, which happens once the transaction that inserts these data is committed, this does not necessarily mean that the Full-Text index has been updated. Full-Text index population is asynchronous.
